multichar-blockscope-highlighter.startDe.description: the string that will be used to delimit start of scope

multichar-blockscope-highlighter.endDeli.description: the string that will be used to delimit end of scope

multichar-blockscope-highlighter.singleL.description: the string that starts a comment

multichar-blockscope-highlighter.multiLi.description: the string that is used to start multiline comment blocks in your language
the string that is used to end multiline comment blocks in your language

multichar-blockscope-highlighter.red.description: the red value for the RGBA highlighting

multichar-blockscope-highlighter.green.description: the green value for the RGBA highlighting

multichar-blockscope-highlighter.blue.description: the blue value for the RGBA highlighting

multichar-blockscope-highlighter.alpha.description: the alpha value (opacity) for the RGBA highlighting
